text: Paul Hogan, AM (born 8 October 1940) is an Australian comedian, actor, producer. He was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Original Screenplay and won a Golden Globe award for his performance as Michael "Crocodile" Dundee in "Crocodile" Dundee (1986). ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Australian movie actors Category:Australian television actors Category:Australian comedians Category:Actors from New South Wales
title: Paul Hogan
